item.title: Bitcoin Withdrawal Recovery, 24-hour CEX Net Outflow of 898.13 BTC
item.description: On September 3rd, according to Coinglass data, in the past 24 hours, a total net outflow of 898.13 BTC has been observed on CEX. The top three CEX with the largest outflow amounts are as follows:· Binance, with an outflow of 1,194.49 BTC;· Coinbase Pro, with an outflow of 674.44 BTC;· Bithumb, with an outflow of 304.17 BTC.In addition, Bitstamp saw an inflow of 335.46 BTC, ranking first in the list of inflows.

item.title: Binance Alpha's new airdrop BOOST will go live on September 5th
item.description: On September 3rd, Binance Alpha will take the lead in listing Boost (BOOST) on September 5th. After trading begins, eligible users can use Binance Alpha Points to claim the airdrop on the Alpha event page. More details will be made public shortly.

item.title: The Federal Reserve will host a "Payment Innovation" conference next month to discuss stablecoins, artificial intelligence, and tokenization
item.description: On September 3rd, the Federal Reserve will hold a "Payment Innovation" conference on October 21st. The conference topics will encompass: stablecoins, artificial intelligence, and tokenization.

item.title: Coinbase Global Site Increases Perpetual Contract Leverage Limit to a maximum of 50x
item.description: On September 3rd, Coinbase International made an announcement regarding the adjustment of the perpetual contract leverage limit. It now allows for a leverage of up to 50x. This feature is accessible to Coinbase Advanced retail and institutional users via the Coinbase International Exchange. Perpetual contracts can only be used in compliant jurisdictions outside the United States.

item.title: American Bitcoin Second-Trigger Circuit Breaker, Gain Narrows to 40.58%
item.description: September 3rd: Following three consecutive limit-up movements, the mining firm American Bitcoin backed by the Trump family witnessed a pullback. It has now triggered its second circuit breaker, and the gain has narrowed to 40.58%.Currently trading at $9.7, the market value has decreased to $161 million.

item.title: Trump Jr.: The mission of American Bitcoin is to build the largest Bitcoin reserve in the United States
item.description: On September 3rd, Donald Trump Jr., the son of former President Donald Trump, expressed his pride in seeing American Bitcoin being listed. This has placed the United States at the forefront of the crypto space. The mission of American Bitcoin is to establish the largest Bitcoin reserve in the United States. When shareholders succeed, America succeeds. It is a new era for Bitcoin in America, and it begins now.

item.title: American Bitcoin experiences a pullback triggering a circuit breaker, with the price increase narrowing to 63.48%.
item.description: September 3rd: After going through three consecutive daily limit-up movements, the mining company American Bitcoin backed by the Trump family has now entered a retracement stage. A circuit breaker has been triggered, and the increase in price has narrowed to 63.48%.Currently trading at $11.28, the market capitalization has dropped to $187 million.

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Surges Past $112,000
item.description: On September 3rd, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin saw a rebound and exceeded $112,000, with a 24-hour growth rate of 0.97%.

item.title: In the past 4 hours, there has been a total of $69,947,300 liquidated across the entire network, with the largest single liquidation being a short position.
item.description: On September 3rd, according to Coinglass data, the total network liquidated $69.9473 million within the past 4 hours. The long liquidations reached a total of $9.431 million, while the short liquidations totaled $60.5162 million.In the past 24 hours, a total of 97,019 people worldwide were liquidated, with a combined liquidation amount of $210 million. The largest single liquidation took place in the HTX-ETH-USDT pair, amounting to $1.7057 million.

item.title: American Bitcoin hits third consecutive circuit breaker, with price surge expanding to 91%
item.description: September 3rd: The mining enterprise American Bitcoin of the Trump family witnessed its third consecutive daily limit-up, and the increase expanded to 91%. Its total market value has increased to $230 million.
